Find your future with us.Boeing Defense Space & Security seeks Mid-Level ASIC FPGA Development and Verification Engineers (level 3) to support the Satellite Capabilities organization and multiple satellite product lines based in El Segundo, CA.Position Responsibilities:Architects, implements, and verifies digital as well as mixed signal solutions.  Designs custom IP, as well as utilizes leading edge commercial IP and VIP across the ASIC and FPGA domains. Structures high-level architectural documentation and develops detailed implementation and verification approaches, implements in SystemVerilog and verifies within a team environment, utilizing UVM.Maintains detailed requirements and specifications for various electronic products.Develops detailed designs of moderate, to complex scope.Conducts various methods of testing and analysis to minimal supervision of a team lead.Leads moderate efforts and small teams under minimal management supervision.This position must meet Export Control compliance requirements, therefore a “US Person”
